titles.title: An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Manchin. Without written report.
Referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.

term.name: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

bill.summary: This resolution authorizes the Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources to make specified expenditures and employ personnel for the 118th Congress.
